participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and expressive, with a passion for baking and a strong interest in social issues.
participant_1.background: I love listening to Britney Spears. I like to tan in tanning beds. I'm high maintenance. I diet a lot.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, with a longing for companionship and a unique perspective on life.
participant_2.background: I am a little girl. I've superpowers. I like to make time stop. I'm very lonely. I live in the cloud.
